org.anddev.andengine.entity.particle.modifier
Class OnAndOffCameraExpireModifier

java.lang.Object
  org.anddev.andengine.entity.particle.modifier.OffCameraExpireModifier
      org.anddev.andengine.entity.particle.modifier.OnAndOffCameraExpireModifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
IParticleInitializer, IParticleModifier
public class OnAndOffCameraExpireModifier
extends OffCameraExpireModifier

Causes the particle to expire after it has entered and left the view of the camera.

This allows you to create a particle off camera, move it on camera, and have it expire once it leaves the camera.

(c) 2011 Nicolas Gramlich
(c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
